channel.title: [ Help - Localhost ]
channel.description:
Anyone join with localhost and then i cant connect anymore / Equipping items :
On my runserver stands :
Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2700 ClientHandler: Accepted from THUIS:2701 Client type: low memory version UserId: 90487821 k o e d has signed onto server. Game saved for player k o e d ClientHandler: Client k o e d disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from 5.146.182.106:1186 Client type: low memory version UserId: 66608236 o w n e d has signed onto server. ClientHandler: Accepted from THUIS:2714 Client type: low memory version UserId: 90487821 k o e d has signed onto server. [b]ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2715[/b]
If i do a item on it dont show it .. And i cant connect is black window

item.title: [ Help - Localhost ]
item.dc:creator: @us_sniper04 us sniper04
item.description:
@us_sniper04 wrote:

hmmmmm

whats your name on ur server?

Read full topic

item.title: [ Help - Localhost ]
item.dc:creator: @William.D William.D
item.description:
@William.D wrote:

Ehh … I think a bronze warhammer & bunny ears are null items ? What to do with it?

Read full topic

item.title: [ Help - Localhost ]
item.dc:creator: @us_sniper04 us sniper04
item.description:
@us_sniper04 wrote:

just leave the ip blank. since your the host it just logs you in without an ip.

Read full topic

item.title: [ Help - Localhost ]
item.dc:creator: @William.D William.D
item.description:
@William.D wrote:

I use my server ip. You can check - 5.146.80.10

[ Hamachi : Lunarscape1 - Pass : Lunar ]

Read full topic

item.title: [ Help - Localhost ]
item.dc:creator: @us_sniper04 us sniper04
item.description:
@us_sniper04 wrote:

when u log on do you use your server ip? or do you use nothing?

Read full topic

item.title: [ Help - Localhost ]
item.dc:creator: @William.D William.D
item.description:
@William.D wrote:

Oh , ok. Im going to try ,

I have removed my items but if i compile it stands by back by [ITEMS]. There is one ‘Null’ too in het player list…

Read full topic

item.title: [ Help - Localhost ]
item.dc:creator: @us_sniper04 us sniper04
item.description:
@us_sniper04 wrote:

ok well then you spawned a null item because it doesnt let you log in when u do.

plus the localhost mean that your logging in…the localhost is you.

Read full topic

item.title: [ Help - Localhost ]
item.dc:creator: @us_sniper04 us sniper04
item.description:
@us_sniper04 wrote:

ok…well have you ever logged onto your server?

Read full topic

item.title: [ Help - Localhost ]
item.dc:creator: @William.D William.D
item.description:
@William.D wrote:

I’m the owner of my server but other people can well log on…

Read full topic

item.title: [ Help - Localhost ]
item.dc:creator: @us_sniper04 us sniper04
item.description:
@us_sniper04 wrote:

as in do an item you mean ::pickup #### ####?

well, that means you have a null item(or whatever you wanna call it) in your inventory…in other words you did a null item spawn.

to fix this problem you go into your characters file and look for your name. click on it and where it says [ITEMS] you go under that and just delete all the items. you dont have to do that but then you will have to go though all the items and see which one was a bad spawn.

Read full topic
